name: ACIDFUR
description:
ACIDBURN, but anthro, custom made for a friend who had a furry OC.

Pretty much anything ACIDBURN could do, this can do, but you can put "anthro" and/or "[animal] girl/boy" in the prompt to make it furry. Also seems to excel at "sketch" images when using DDIM.

meta.prompt: detailed intricate complex, (anthro, cowboy shot, standing:1.2), high quality, indoors, lifelike texture, cinematic lighting, photorealistic, (1girl, fox woman, paws, (prismatic holographic hyper detailed intricate complicated Long coat fengguan pattern), stern smile, glowing eyes, multicolored hair long hair topknot), absurdres, on extremely detailed bathtub, bandage, warp, dual persona, athletic, pov doorway, (best quality, sketch)
